thread.section_title: Eredi Pisanò Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Eredi Pisanò | www.eredipisano.com
thread.title: James Demer
thread.title_full: Eredi Pisanò reviewed by James Demer

author: James Demer
title: James Demer
text: I've been purchasing clothing from the Eredi Pisanò store in NYC for a few years and this was my first online order. Elamy Morales has been my salesperson since I started shopping there and she has a keen sense of style and a no pressure sales approach. I always feel like a million bucks when I wear EP apparel. It's fun to mix high style with casual wear and the quality of their clothing is made to last and look stylish for many years.
